main_definition: Briefs can refer to two different things: a type of underwear or short, concise statements (legal briefs) meant to present an argument.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Undergarments made from elasticized fabric that cover only the lower body
meanings_and_examples.example: He chose a pair of briefs for comfort during his long flight.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Short, formal documents presented to a court by one party in a legal case summarizing the arguments and evidence supporting their position.
meanings_and_examples.example: The defense team submitted several briefs outlining why they believed their client was innocent of the charges.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A concise, summary version of a written document or speech
meanings_and_examples.example: Before delivering his presentation, he reviewed the key points and arguments in a brief outline to stay on track.
